muxt generate --receiver-type=App

stderr 'has been deprecated'
stderr 'use --use-receiver-type instead'

exists template_routes.go

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- app.go --
package main

type App struct{}
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "template.gohtml"))
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET /"}}Hello{{end}}
